node.name: Firedoclipse
node.shortdescription:
Integrates Eclipse and Firefox to help you access full, browsable online documentation for entities in Java, JavaScript, HTML, and Ant.

Hold down a (customizable) modifier key and click a keyword in Eclipse to bring up the documentation web page for that keyword in a Firefox tab. The page can be browsed, searched, etc. with all the usual Firefox features.

Requires Firefox 3+. Visit the plugin home page to install the Firedoclipse extension in Firefox.

Firedoclipse is free software under the X11 (aka MIT) License.
node.body:
Integrates Eclipse and Firefox to help you access full, browsable online documentation for entities in Java, JavaScript, HTML, and Ant.

Hold down a (customizable) modifier key and click a keyword in Eclipse to bring up the documentation web page for that keyword in a Firefox tab. The page can be browsed, searched, etc. with all the usual Firefox features.

Requires Firefox 3+. Visit the plugin home page to install the Firedoclipse extension in Firefox.

Firedoclipse is free software under the X11 (aka MIT) License.
